<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Defensive Recovery](/Feats.aspx?ID=294) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Metamagic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=107" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 125 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[harmful font or healing font](/Classes.aspx?ID=5)

</column>

---

Your faith provides temporary protection in addition to healing. If the next action you use is to cast [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) on a single target and the target regains Hit Points from the spell, it also gains a +2 status bonus to AC and saving throws for 1 round.
name: Defensive Recovery
